page.title: 18SHOPPING SURVEY IN HAMPTON
page.content: We did our shopping survey in Hampton shopping precinct. We asked six shoppers seven different questions. 5 of the people we asked were shopping and 1 person was having a drink in the pub. 2 people walked there,3 people came by car and 1 person cycled. It took 5 of the people less than 10 mins.to get there and it took 1 person 15 mins. to get there. 4 of the shoppers came to the precinct more than once a week, 1 person came about once a month and 1 person came once a week. None of the people would buy furniture or clothes in the precinct because the shops were too small. All the people were only buying food.The main food shop was Sainsburys. All the people lived in Hampton except for one person who lived in Teddington. WALDEGRAVE SCHOOL
